mapper.select: select count(*) from NOTICE_TEMP where NOTICE_STATUS='N'
select NOTICE_NO, user_Id, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_DATE, NOTICE_COUNT, NOTICE_STATUS from NOTICE_TEMP join member m using (user_no) where NOTICE_STATUS='N' order by NOTICE_DATE desc
mapper.insert: insert into NOTICE_TEMP values('N'||seq_nno.nextval, #{userNo}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, default, 0, default)
mapper.select: select count(*) from PERSON_QUESTION where QUESTION_STATUS='N'
select * from PERSON_QUESTION join member m using (user_no) where QUESTION_STATUS='N' order by A_QUESTION_NO desc
select * from PERSON_QUESTION where A_QUESTION_NO=#{qno} and QUESTION_STATUS='N'
mapper.insert: insert into ATTACHMENT values('AT'||SEQ_ATNO.nextval, #{refNo}, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{filePath}, default, 1, default)
mapper.select: select PROJECT_CATEGORY from CATEGORY_TYPE where rownum<=1 order by PROJECT_CATEGORY desc
select A.*, c.PROJECT_NAME from ATTACHMENT A join CATEGORY_TYPE C on (PROJECT_CATEGORY = REF_NO) where REF_NO = #{cno} and STATUS = 'N'
select A.*, c.PROJECT_NAME from ATTACHMENT A join CATEGORY_TYPE C on (PROJECT_CATEGORY = REF_NO) where STATUS='N'

select p.PROJECT_NUMBER as PROJECT_NUMBER, REWARD_NO as REWARD_NO, p.PROJECT_NAME as PROJECT_NAME, m2.user_id as user_id, FUNDING_COST as FUNDING_COST, FUNDING_QUANTITY as FUNDING_QUANTITY, PROJECT_TARGET_AMOUNT as PROJECT_TARGET_AMOUNT, PROJECT_FINISHDATE as PROJECT_FINISHDATE, c.PROJECT_NAME as CATEGORY_NAME, (select sum(FUNDING_COST*FUNDING_QUANTITY) from FUNDING_LIST f join PROJECT p on (f.PROJECT_NUMBER = p.PROJECT_NUMBER) join CATEGORY_TYPE c on (p.PROJECT_CATEGORY = c.PROJECT_CATEGORY) join member m on (f.user_no = m.user_no) join member m2 on (p.user_no = m2.user_no) where f.PROJECT_NUMBER = #{pr} group by p.PROJECT_NUMBER) as total from FUNDING_LIST f join PROJECT p on (f.PROJECT_NUMBER = p.PROJECT_NUMBER) join CATEGORY_TYPE c on (p.PROJECT_CATEGORY = c.PROJECT_CATEGORY) join member m on (f.user_no = m.user_no) join member m2 on (p.user_no = m2.user_no) where f.PROJECT_NUMBER = #{pr} and rownum <= 1
